text: @realDonaldTrump YES, LAW AND ORDER FOR ALL THOSE GOOD AMERICANS THAT YOU HAVE UNJUSTLY FIRE! LAW AND ORDER FOR THE PEOPLE DYING, OR DEAD OF COVID-19 BECAUSE OF YOUR INACTION.
